summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for Southern Financial, LLC, a limited liability company formed in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the formation, management, and operational structure of the company, including the roles and responsibilities of the Sole Member, Southern Trust Company, Inc., and its initial manager, Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is designated as the initial manager of Southern Financial, LLC, with full authority to manage the company's business and affairs.

persons.name: Southern Trust Company, Inc.
persons.context: Southern Trust Company, Inc. is identified as the Sole Member of Southern Financial, LLC, responsible for the company's formation and capital contributions.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the manager of Southern Financial, LLC, which is solely owned by Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The Operating Agreement was executed on February 26, 2013.
Southern Financial, LLC was formed under the U.S. Virgin Islands Limited Liability Company Act.
Jeffrey Epstein is appointed as the initial manager of the company.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. is the Sole Member and responsible for capital contributions.
The company is structured to allow the Sole Member to transfer membership units at any time.
